title: help w/ this please
body: i just got a 14 day ban for being toxic which i think is actually stupid, i didnt even get the thing where i only get to say 5 things per game it just went straight to the 14 day ban, why

replies.body: Hmmmm you should have received a warning in the client, but in some extreme cases players can skip levels of punishment. Reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to provide all the context you need.
